game.util

Interface UpdateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ball, BreakOut_Ball, Brick, Building, Camera, GM, House, Input, Pad, PhysicsEngine, Racket, RecourceHandler, Score, Sprite, TestInputSprite, TestSprite

    public interface UpdateListener
    A UpdateListener is added to a Updater to receive time independent updates.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Julius Häger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(long timeNano)
      Called by a Updater to update a UpdateListener.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(long timeNano)
        Called by a Updater to update a UpdateListener.
        Parameters:
        timeNano - this time since the last update.
        (in nanoseconds)
